meanings.definition: (Latin) to burn, consume by fire; to cremate
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) to burn, consume by fire; to cremate

examples.translation: The body was burned to ashes.
The Romans used to cremate the dead.

usage_notes.explanation: This is a Latin verb. It is the root of the English word 'cremate'.

readability_explanation.text: This entry describes the Latin verb 'cremare'.
